title: How to Make a Washington Apple

methods.name: Making a Washington Apple in a Shaker

steps.headline: Pour Canadian whiskey, sour apple schnapps, and cranberry juice into a shaker.
steps.description: Use 1  fl oz (30 mL) each of the whiskey, schnapps, and juice.

steps.headline: Add ice and shake the mixture.
steps.description: Toss in a few cubes of ice, put the top on the shaker, and shake it vigorously to mix the drink.

steps.headline: Enjoy the drink in a chilled martini glass.
steps.description: Pour the drink through a fine strainer into a chilled martini glass and savor the flavor of this cocktail. Garnish with fanned apples on a cocktail pick, if desired.

methods.name: Building a Washington Apple in a Highball

steps.headline: Add Canadian whiskey, sour apple schnapps, and cranberry juice to a highball glass.
steps.description: Pour in 1  fl oz (30 mL) of each liquid.

steps.headline: Put some ice in the glass.
steps.description: Add a few ice cubes into the glass and stir it to mix up the liquids.

steps.headline: Garnish the drink.
steps.description: Drop an apple slice in your cocktail and enjoy this sweet but tart drink!
